name: 方圓
objective:
以網際網路為本，介紹電腦網路基本概念與企業實務運作，奠定網路架構基礎，並說明資訊安全的重要性。

This course aims at teaching the basic, introductory networking topics as a firm foundation with the latest advances in wireless networking and providing the importance and ins and outs of information security as well.
